required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of New Specifications (38mm) of FirehawkTM in the Treatment of Coronary Heart Disease
clinical_study.official_title: The Safety and Effectiveness Evaluation of New Specifications (38mm) of FirehawkTM Sirolimus Target-eluting Coronary Stent System in the Treatment of Coronary Heart Disease: a Prospective, Multicenter, Single-group Study.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evalute the clinical safety and effectiveness of released specification (38mm) of FirehawkTM Sirolimus target-eluting coronary stent system.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: all patients implanted Firehawk stent of new specification (38mm long)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30 days, 6 months, 12 months and 2-5 years after stent implantation

arm_group.description: Implantation of the released specification (38mm) of FirehawkTM rapamycin target-eluting coronary stent systems

overall_official.affiliation: Fu Wai Hospital & National Center for Cardiovascular Diseases in China
